name: Sky of dragons
description:
How to play
Kill other dragons and/or crows to grow your dragon and earn experience points. Use your points to improve your stats and become the ruler of the skies.

Controls
Turn with: a d
Sprint / Brake with: w s
Shot with: space
Increase your stats: 7 8 9 0

Strategies
If you increase your energy you will improve your mana and its regeneration as well as the power of your shot.

If you increase your stamina you will improve your life and its regeneration, in addition, you will be able to sprint for a longer time.

If you increase your agility you will improve your movement speed and you will be able to shoot faster.

If you increase your strength you will improve the distance of your shot and your damage absorption.
